lead_paragraph: LIEBERMAN--Philip H.,M.D. 91 years old. WWII veteran. Retired chief of surgical pathology Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center. Died December 26. Beloved husband of Cynthia, proud and loving father of Samuel (Cara) and David (Asya). Devoted grandpa to Daniel, Henry, and Lucy. He was the most gentle of gentlemen. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LIEBERMAN, PHILIP H.
